lines.text: Hey Oppenheimer! Oppenheimer! You oughta stop playing God, 'cause you're no good at it, and the position's taken!
Gotta come down out of the clouds gentlemen, and get into the business... of winning the war.
It's all about ass, isn't it? Either you kick it... or you lick it.
We could give this country the biggest stick in the playground, and I intend to do that.
I want three stories. The first, if we succeed. The second, if we fail. The third, if we disintegrate.
